title: Divine Diamond Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Accents
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a captivating design with round floral motifs set with shimmering cubic zirconia diamonds, accented by vibrant Ruby and Emerald cabochons. The pendant features a detailed filigree design, complemented with a pear-shaped Emerald drop and delicate gold bead dangles.
colors: with vibrant pops of red (Ruby) and green (Emerald). The rhodium polish enhances the brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: and grand festivals (Panduga). Its elegant design also makes it suitable for high-end parties and special occasions.
description: This piece is a true statement of elegance, blending traditional South Indian design with contemporary brilliance. The high-quality Cubic Zirconia provides a diamond-like sparkle at an accessible price point. The use of traditional red and green gemstones adds a touch of auspiciousness, making it a cherished heirloom.
